code: public static float getAverageFontHeight(PDFont font, float fontSize) throws IOException {     return font.getBoundingBox().getHeight() / PDF_PIXEL_SIZE * fontSize. }
public static float getFontHeightForString(String str, PDFont font, float fontSize) throws IOException {     return font.getBoundingBox().getHeight() / PDF_PIXEL_SIZE * fontSize. }
public static float getFontWidth(String str, PDFont font, float fontSize) throws IOException {     return font.getStringWidth(str) / PDF_PIXEL_SIZE * fontSize. }
